employees.notes: Proff lists the company with 177 employees on the company profile page.[1]

revenue.notes: Proff reports 2024 operating revenue as 1 210 694 with amounts stated in thousands ("Beløp i 1000"), converted here to NOK.[1]

company.entity_resolution_notes: Entity resolved as the Norwegian legal entity FINNFJORD AS using Proff legal name and organization number 934 039 254.[1]

srm_assessment.overall_summary: Finnfjord describes ferrosilicon production inputs as quartz, iron ore, coal, coke, and biocarbon; reviewed sources do not document recycled/recovered/waste-derived inbound inputs (SRM) with quantified use.[2][3]
gaps_and_uncertainties: Norskeutslipp confirms a permit exists for the site, but the permit document content was not retrievable here; SRM input evidence may exist only in inaccessible permit/attachments.[3]

evidence.evidence_snippet: Juridisk navn FINNFJORD AS Org nr 934 039 254
evidence.claim: Legal entity name and organization number for Finnfjord AS.

evidence.evidence_snippet: 24.100 Produksjon av jern og stål, samt ferrolegeringer
FeSi lages med utgangspunkt i kvarts, jernmalm, kull, koks og biokarbon
evidence.claim: Core production inputs are listed as conventional raw materials plus biocarbon.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Jernmalmpellets (Fe2O3), kvarts (SiO2) og karbon, i form av kull, koks og biokarbon (C), tilsettes på toppen av ovnen.
evidence.claim: Input factors fed to furnace are iron ore pellets, quartz, and carbon sources.

evidence.evidence_snippet: Tillatelse og kontrollrapporter: Tillatelse, Kontroll 2008, Kontroll 2009, Kontroll 2011
evidence.claim: Norskeutslipp indicates an environmental permit and control reports exist for the facility.
Financial amounts are presented in thousands.

sources.title: Finnfjord AS - Org.nr. 934 039 254 - Finnsnes - Se Regnskap, Roller og mer
